plugin.name: mume_key_substitutions
plugin.author: Nick Stockton
plugin.purpose: Identifies door keys in the player's inventory.

trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a jade-encrusted key - archeddoor under hatch, Lorien (USE DECAY)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a jewel-encrusted key - jewelleddoor, Balrog rings key")

trigger.match: a key attached to a vine-rope
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a key attached to a vine-rope - Ingrove gate key")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a large flint key - exit from aisle in Moria")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a copper key - grate, pipeweed smugglers")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a crude metal key - Filthy or Brolg")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", ""a darkly stained metal key - irondoor, Guardian")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a decayed iron key - sconce treasure room at BW")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a decayed ironkey - sconce, BW treasury")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a large key - wall, Old Wight")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a metal and stone key - cinderblock + tapestry, Eregion")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a metal key - either oakendoor at Necro or Tharbad chief")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a mithril key - mithrildoor, Balrog rings (TIME/ZONE DECAY)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a polished copper key - door + irondoor, DT")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a rigid metal key - trapdoor, GH Old Ruins")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a rusted iron key - orcs dungeon, Dunland")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a rusted key - Cryptdoor, Old Wight")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a shining key - archeddoors, Muranog's treasury")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a shop key - shops, Tharbad")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a silvery key - door, GC room")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a simple metal key - cover, BM mines")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a skull key - burialtrap, near Hillmen")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a slightly bent iron key - jade bracelet chest")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a slimy iron key - vaultdoor, Icedoor")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a slimy metal key - 3 irondoors in Shaghosh area")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small brass key - brassdoor, thorns/hedge tower")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small copper key - granite, Unqalome")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small iron key - either chest at overseer or illusionist")

trigger.match: a small key carved from ebony
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small key carved from ebony - board + grating at Necro")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a twisted iron key - irondoor, entrance to BW (Rentable/USE DECAY)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a twisted root - wall, Ferny")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a very rusty key - gate, nobleman east of Tharbad")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a wooden key - secret, treevillage (Rentable)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an ancient dwarven key - flagstone, circlet chest (USE DECAY)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small twisted root - wall, Ferny")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small rusted iron key - metaldoor, Dunland Orcs")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small silver key - either MA upgrade or blackdoor at Sage")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small steel key - slab, Unqalome")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small stone key - stonelatch, Bulag's treasury")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a square stone key - force, Amon Othar")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an ancient key - stoneslab, lww smugglers")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an ancient silver key - OiE Book")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an ebony key - 1 of 2 doors up from knight in rdell")

trigger.match: a small key of elven make
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a small key of elven make - ELF CAMP SOUTH OF RD")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an engraved silver ring - crypt near WC")

trigger.match: The key of metal has a small loop at its top, which makes it easier to wear on a keyring. Some ridges have been cut into its base.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "The key of metal has a small loop at its top, which makes it easier to wear on a keyring. Some ridges have been cut into its base. - oakendoor at Necro")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an engraved stone key - irondoor to overseer")

trigger.match: You notice 'My Cottage' has been inscribed on the key.
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "You notice 'My Cottage' has been inscribed on the key. - Tharbad Chief")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a Fornost city key - Fornost Gates (RENTABLE)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a Jail key - jaildoor, Bree (RENTABLE)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a stone key - pillars, mattock armoury")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tarnished metal key - doors in VT")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tarnished silver key - Battle-standard quest from Brolg")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tinted brass key - door, gilded ghost")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tiny bronze key - Marbledoor, outcast")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an icy key - all doors, Balrog treasury (TIME/ZONE DECAY)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an intricate steel key - Umuk's chest (bda) (TIME/ZONE DECAY)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an iron key - rockface (not the one at ooc)")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a bent bone key - stonedoor, silver bracer")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an old bronze key - Wolfgate, irondoors, NOC")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a big metal key - oakendoor, Rohir tower")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "an old iron key - rockdoor, GC")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a big stonekey - stonedoor, BBT")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a black and silver key - slab, Old Wight")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a black bone key - door, Nagrorh")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a dirty key - trapdoor, bandit leader")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a dirty stone key - floor/ceiling, 2h-axe Eregion")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tiny copper key - WAREHOUSE, Tharbad")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a fragile stone key - stonedoor, Unqalome")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tiny silver key - 1 of 2 doors up from knight in Rdell")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a glass key - flagstone, DK")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tiny silvery key - branchtop, Lorien")

trigger.match: a granite key inlaid with wood
trigger.send: CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a granite key inlaid with wood - chest, Eregion 2 statues")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tiny stone key - stonedoor + prisondoor Barbaras")
CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a tiny stonekey - stonedoor+prisondoor, Barbaras")

CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a green key - halldoor, Eregion")

CallPlugin(screenReader, "sayNote", "a heavy steel key - stonedoor/rockface, OOC")
